version_description: Heaps of stability improvements including fixes to glitches and holes in the space-time continuum. We hope you enjoy playing Battlelands Royale as much as we enjoy developing it!

Oh my it’s a BIG ONE!

- THE MESSENGER is back! Your favourite valentine is in bundles for a limited time. Don’t miss him!
- NEW WEAPON! Try your hand at the revolver.
- New SPECIAL GAME MODE! Prep your quick draw for the Saloon Showdown.
- FREE STUFF! Get free stuff in the shop EVERY DAY! How great is that?
- MORE MATCH REWARDS! Get bonus rewards after each match!
- MORE BALANCING! Tweaks to make Battlelands Royale even more rewarding.

+ so much more. Go play!
Heaps of stability improvements including fixes to glitches and holes in the space-time continuum. We hope you enjoy playing Battlelands Royale as much as we enjoy developing it!

OH MY, WE’VE REACHED SEASON 10!
- New characters, flags and more! If you’re a Season 1 battler, one of them might jog your memory.
- A BUSH OUTFIT! Get it at the Battle Shop or inside Supply Crates for some pro camouflaging. Strategic positioning time!
- MC Cass is bringing the heat! He’s in a new exclusive bundle and oh boy, he’s got swag!
- Be Double Prepared: Now you can get consumables at the Battle Shop and already drop in the map with one of your choice!
Get ready for all of that and +!
Heaps of stability improvements including fixes to glitches and holes in the space-time continuum. We hope you enjoy playing Battlelands Royale as much as we enjoy developing it!
Heaps of stability improvements including fixes to glitches and holes in the space-time continuum. We hope you enjoy playing Battlelands Royale as much as we enjoy developing it!

TIME FOR A FRESH NEW UPDATE!
In this one you will find some greatness such as:
- The STORM HELMET! Stay immune to the storm for 15 seconds when using it.
- Rebalance and tweaks: Some of your favorite weapons and consumables got even better!
- More TIRSKness: The Energy Drink’s effect now lasts longer!
- A hot deal! The great Gina Hothead is back in a new bundle!
- One more slot in the Battle Shop for Daily (Awesome) Featured Items.

TIME FOR A FRESH NEW UPDATE!
In this one you will find some greatness such as:
- The STORM HELMET! Stay immune to the storm for 15 seconds when using it.
- Rebalance and tweaks: Some of your favorite weapons and consumables got even better!
- More TIRSKness: The Energy Drink’s effect now lasts longer!
- A hot deal! The great Gina Hothead is back in a new bundle!
- One more slot in the Battle Shop for Daily (Awesome) Featured Items.

Can you believe that we’re in Season 11 already? WOW!
- A new Battle Pass is bringing all the freshness you need: New characters, flags, melee weapons and more!
- What about a cute teddy bear? Not here! Gus is beary angry and ready to get some wins! Get him in the newest bundle that comes with other awesome items AND 100 gems!
- New special items! Slow down and get some damage to your enemies with the Freeze and Incendiary Traps!

Mid-Season 11 Update is HERE!
- Loads of weapon balancing. What’s your new favourite weapon?
- Freeze Traps, Incendiary Traps & Storm Helmets are now better than ever! You can also get them from Supply Crates.
- New Battle Flag! One of your favourite YouTube creators got his own flag.
- Minimap improvements & other fixes and tweaks for a smoother gaming experience.

Mid-Season 11 Update is HERE!
- Loads of weapon balancing. What’s your new favourite weapon?
- Freeze Traps, Incendiary Traps & Storm Helmets are now better than ever! You can also get them from Supply Crates.
- New Battle Flag! One of your favourite YouTube creators got his own flag.
- Minimap improvements & other fixes and tweaks for a smoother gaming experience.

Season 12 - Here we go!
- Introducing General Stare, Inara and Lieutenant Grillface. They'll take care of you during the journey through space and time.
- Weapon stats are back. We missed you!
- All new Battle Pass with out of this world content such as new parachutes, flags and melee weapons!
+ More soon!

Mid-Season 12 Update is HERE!
- Loads of weapon and special item balancing.
- Season 11 stats were left out. We fixed this for you!
- Miss Pumpkin and Dave of the Dead are back!
- Underscore, dash and numbers are now OK to use with Battler Tags!
- Bug fixes and improvements.

Battlers, we are excited to announce that we are also working on [ ##ERROR## "Classified Information" ]

Mid-Season 12 Update is HERE!
- Loads of weapon and special item balancing.
- Season 11 stats were left out. We fixed this for you!
- Miss Pumpkin and Dave of the Dead are back!
- Underscore, dash and numbers are now OK to use with Battler Tags!
- Bug fixes and improvements.

Battlers, we are excited to announce that we are also working on [ ##ERROR## "Classified Information" ]

Battlers. Listen up!

- Season 13 is here and it's cyber cool.
- Pack your bags. Your new destination is the completely redesigned Battle Island!
- New exclusive bundle character... it's legendary.
- Grenade Launcher. Yes. *Explosion sounds*
- Surprise Box -special item.
- New Special Game Modes.
- Winter holiday bundles.

+ Bug fixes and improvements

Mid-Season 13 Update is HERE!

- The Messenger is back for a limited time special bundle! A new chance for you to get this lovable Legendary character!
- Make your way to the Downtown area on the map and join the Valentine’s Day festivities
- We’ve tweaked some weapons and consumables for a better overall balance

Season 14 is here! Grab that cold TIRSK drink and ready up!

- All new Season 14 Battle Pass with new characters, flags, weapons and parachutes!
- Something went horribly wrong. Check out the Failed Experiment bundle!
- Can you carry the new Heavy Rifle?
- Test your skills with the Heavy Rifle in the new Special Game Mode.
- Heal up the whole squad with the First Aid Special Item!
- Some old familiar faces are upgraded to Legendary status, sporting all new alternative outfits!

Season 14 is in full swing! Keep battling!

- Great-Uncle Sam is back in an exclusive bundle!
- Lots of weapon and item balancing.
- Bug fixes and improvements.
